Speaker.hpid: The Taoiseach Albert Reynolds

Speaker.hpid: Mr. J. Higgins Mr. J. Higgins

Speaker.hpid: An Ceann Comhairle Seán Treacy

Speaker.hpid: Mr. J. Higgins Mr. J. Higgins

Speaker.hpid: The Taoiseach Albert Reynolds

Speaker.hpid: Mr. Rabbitte Mr. Rabbitte

Speaker.hpid: An Ceann Comhairle Seán Treacy

Speaker.hpid: Mr. Rabbitte Mr. Rabbitte
Speaker.P: No, Sir. The Chair knows I would not do that. Will the Taoiseach indicate if he considers programme managers are meeting sufficiently frequently, if the system is working efficiently and whether he has any plans to introduce changes to it?

Speaker.hpid: An Ceann Comhairle Seán Treacy

Speaker.hpid: Mr. J. Bruton Mr. J. Bruton

Speaker.hpid: An Ceann Comhairle Seán Treacy
Speaker.P: That seems to be a separate question.

Speaker.hpid: The Taoiseach Albert Reynolds
Speaker.P: It is a separate question and the Deputy should put down a question on it.

Speaker.hpid: Mr. J. Bruton Mr. J. Bruton

Speaker.hpid: An Ceann Comhairle Seán Treacy

Speaker.P: Does the Taoiseach know the number of hours in a year?

Speaker.hpid: Miss Harney Miss Harney

Speaker.hpid: Mr. J. O'Keeffe Mr. J. O'Keeffe
Speaker.P: Will the Taoiseach indicate the number of meetings of programme managers to discuss the presidency of the High Court?

Speaker.hpid: An Ceann Comhairle Seán Treacy

Speaker.hpid: Mr. J. Bruton Mr. J. Bruton

Speaker.hpid: The Taoiseach Albert Reynolds
Speaker.P: I do not need lectures from the Deputy.

Speaker.hpid: Mr. J. Bruton Mr. J. Bruton

Speaker.hpid: An Ceann Comhairle Seán Treacy

MainHeading.Title: Ceisteanna—Questions. Oral Answers. - Northern Ireland Peace Process.

Qst.hpid: Mr. J. O'Keeffe Mr. J. O'Keeffe
Qst.Quest: his views on the statement made by the Secretary of State for Northern Ireland in Belfast on 10 October 1994, that the British Government may never be in a position to say it accepts that the IRA ceasefire is permanent.

Qst.hpid: Mr. J. O'Keeffe Mr. J. O'Keeffe
Qst.Quest: his views on the loyalist ceasefire in Northern Ireland.

Qst.hpid: Mr. J. O'Keeffe Mr. J. O'Keeffe
Qst.Quest: the proposals, if any, he has to visit Northern Ireland and meet political leaders there.

Qst.hpid: Mr. J. O'Keeffe Mr. J. O'Keeffe

if a date has been set for a summit between himself and the British Prime Minister to discuss the framework document and the peace process in Northern Ireland.

Qst.hpid: Mr. Currie Mr. Currie Mr. Bradford Mr. Bradford Mrs. Owen Mrs. Owen Mr. J. Bruton Mr. J. Bruton
Qst.asker: Mr. J. Bruton, Mrs. Owen, Mr. Bradford and Mr. Currie

Qst.hpid: Mr. Currie Mr. Currie Mr. Bradford Mr. Bradford Mrs. Owen Mrs. Owen Mr. J. Bruton Mr. J. Bruton
